item.title: Setting up a SQL database with AWS.
item.description: Making a database on Amazon Step 1: Create an AWS account. I did it a long time ago, it’s pretty straightforward, I’m not going to re-do it here for no reason. Step 2: Follow Items 1-5 only in this tutorial to create a databaset instance. Step 3: Make sure you choose the free tier! Select whatever username and password you want - but it’s a pain in the butt to add additional users, so if security is not a huge concern and you want your database to be broadly accessible, choose a username and password that you’re willing to share.
